    Updates

    In 2017, I got to work with

    Tony Wharmby, Stephen D. Binder, Ed Scott, Katy Mixon, Linda Mendoza, Jason Kennedy, Brett Greenstein, Scott Clifton, Diedrich Bader, Stephanie Birkett, Christy Dooley, Michael Richards, …

    In 2016, I got to work with these amazing people (in reverse alphabetical order):

    Kristin Wendell, Benji Weinstein, Natasha Ward, Christine Shevchenko, Faryn Einhorn, Juel Bestrop, Troian Bellisario, Dan Bell, …

    In 2015, I got to work with these amazing people (in reverse alphabetical order):

    Kerry Washington, Tom Verica, Larry Trilling, John Terlesky, Stephen Belber, Hayley Atwell, …

    Straight White Men

    I’ve been understudying Straight White Men at the Kirk Douglas Theatre in Culver City, and I’ve just learned that I’m going on for tonight’s performance!

    News, January 2015

    The year 2015 has gotten off to a good start with multiple shoots in January.

    Breath and Imagination: Nomination

    We learned tonight that Breath and Imagination has been nominated for the 2014 Ovation Awards in the category of Best Play (Large Theatre).

    We learned tonight that Breath and Imagination has been nominated for the 2014 Ovation Awards in the category of Best Play (Large Theatre).
